‍BROWSER.Definition: the computer programme you use to surf the internet

‍FOR ONE.Definition: used to say that you think your opinion or action is right, even if others do not

‍CONDENSE.Definition: to reduce something, such as a speech or piece of writing, in length

‍ETHER.Definition: the sky or the air, especially considered as being full of radio waves

‍PILE.Definition: a mass of something that has been placed somewhere

‍SHAPE.Definition: to decide or influence the form of something, especially a belief or idea, or someone's character

‍PLEADING.Definition: showing in an emotional way that you want something urgently
